short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GrowthSchool Extension: Your Smart Browsing Companion

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
GrowthSchool Extension brings powerful tools right into your browser to boost productivity and streamline your workflow. Translate content instantly, extract key insights from webpages, and keep track of your sessions without disrupting your browsing experience.

Key Features:

Instant Content Translation: Translate any webpage or selected text with a single click.
Smart Data Extraction & Summaries: Capture important information and generate concise summaries on the go.
Session Persistence: Easily pick up where you left off, even after closing the browser.

Unlock a smarter, more efficient way to navigate and manage content with the Growth school Extensionâ€”your ultimate productivity companion!
